name: DataTable
title: Advanced Data Table
description: A comprehensive table component with sorting, filtering, pagination, and export functionality. Fully responsive with mobile card view.
features: Smart pagination with dynamic page sizes
Responsive design with mobile card view

columns.description: Array of column definitions with key, header, cell renderer, and other properties

data.description: Array of data objects to display in the table

emptyMessage.description: Message to show when no data is present

examples.title: Basic Usage
examples.code:
const basicColumns = [{ key: 'id', header: 'ID' }, { key: 'name', header: 'Name' }];

<DataTable columns={basicColumns} data={users} />

examples.title: With All Features
examples.description: Table with search, filter, sort, pagination, and export
examples.code:
<DataTable
  columns={advancedColumns}
  data={users}
  searchable={true}
  filterable={true}
  sortable={true}
  paginated={true}
  exportable={true}
  selectable={true}
/>
